Package store

Class StoreFront

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.StoreFront
  • public class StoreFront
extends java.lang.Object
    Primary class used to manage sales of items.

    pahlz

      • viewStore

        public void viewStore()
        Prints all items for sale to the console.

        Sort order is determined by sortSetting variable (0 by default):
        0: by name, ascending.
        1: by name, descending.
        2: by price, ascending.
        3: by price, descending.

      • viewStoreString

        public java.lang.String viewStoreString()

        The ArrayList containing all items currently for sale in shop.

      • emptyCart

        public void emptyCart()
        Empties cart item by item, returning to store's inventory

      • checkout

        public java.lang.String checkout()
        Prints a receipt to the console showing all items from the cart and the total price, then empties the cart.
        Returns:
        The receipt of all purchased items with total price.
